scripts.one: echo 'Cleaning up' & rm -rf dist work/* build/* node_modules nwjs* && wget https://dl.nwjs.io/v0.30.5/nwjs-sdk-v0.30.5-osx-x64.zip
scripts.two: echo 'Setting up file structure' && mkdir -p build/{bin/gmc,interface} && cp -r src/* build/
scripts.three: echo 'Setting up nwjs project' & unzip -qo nwjs-sdk-v0.30.5-osx-x64.zip && cp -r nwjs-sdk-v0.30.5-osx-x64/ work/
scripts.five: echo 'Installing yarn and bower deps...' & cd build && yarn install -fp && cd interface && bower install && rm -f package.json
scripts.seven: echo 'Moving build to working directory.' & mv build work/nwjs.app/Contents/Resources/app.nw
scripts.eight: mkdir -p dist && mv work/nwjs.app dist/Musicoin\ Desktop.app
scripts.preinstall: yarn one && yarn two && yarn three
scripts.postinstall: yarn four && yarn five && yarn six
scripts.rebuild: rm -rf dist work build && yarn two && yarn three && yarn postinstall && yarn prepare
